page.title: 14BLACKBURN ROVERS F.C.
page.content: Blackburn Rovers are our town football team. Their ground is at Ewood Park, just off Bolton Road in Blackburn. They were first formed in 1875. Their manager in 1985 is Bobby Saxton, their chairman is William Fox and their captain is Derek Fazackerley. An average crowd attendance at Ewood Park is 11000, the ground capacity is 24300. Every other Saturday the team play at home, it is Â£1.40p for children to go in. When you get in the ground the atmosphere is terrific, all the fans chant and shout in support of their team. Blackburn Rovers play in blue and white. At present they are in the 2nd of the 4 divisions in England, but in the last two seasons they have come close to going into the 1st division.
